content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Setup at (15.5,70.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5,70.5) facing DOWN (connected to power)
- Stone furnace at (16.0,73.0) (out of fuel, no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at (17.5,70.5) (facing furnace, has fuel)
- Wooden chest at (16.5,76.5) (output storage)
- Output inserter at (16.5,75.5) (connects furnace to chest)

### Coal Mining and Smelting Setup at (20.0,20.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0,20.0) facing RIGHT (has fuel, working)
- Stone furnace at (23.0,20.0) (has fuel, no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at (21.5,20.5) (properly connected)
- Wooden chest at (24.5,21.5) (output storage)

### Power Generation System at (-11.5,69.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (-11.5,69.5) (working, producing water)
- Boiler at (-6.5,70.0) (now has fuel)
- Steam engine at (-2.5,70.5) (now connected to power network)
- Pipe network connecting water system (positions: (-11.5,68.5), (-10.5,68.5), (-9.5,68.5), (-9.5,69.5), (-8.5,69.5), (-8.5,70.5))
- Steam pipe network (positions: (-5.5,67.5), (-4.5,67.5), (-3.5,67.5), (-2.5,67.5), (-6.5,68.5), (-5.5,68.5))

### New Iron Ore Mining Setup at (17.5,73.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill at (17.5,73.5) (not receiving power)
- Small electric pole at (17.5,71.5) (recently replaced)
- Stone furnace at (20.0,73.0) (working, producing iron plates)
- Wooden chest at (21.5,74.5) (empty)
- Output inserter at (21.5,74.5) (connects furnace to chest)

### New Mining Setup at (25.0,75.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (25.0,75.0) (output blocked)
- Burner inserter at (26.5,75.5) (waiting for source items)

### New Partial Setup at (19.0,54.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at (19.0,54.0)
- Wooden chest at (19.5,55.5)
- Burner inserter at (18.5,55.5) (recently placed)

### New Iron Smelting Line at (100,100)
Consists of following entities:
- Transport belts at (103.5,100.5), (106.5,100.5), (109.5,100.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Distance Placement Issues
- Failed placements at (162.0,150.5), (16.0,72.0), (18.5,55.5) due to distance
- Solution:
  - Always check player distance to target before placement (max 10 tiles)
  - Implement movement to target area before placement attempts

### Entity Access Errors
- Failed to access burner mining drill at (16.0,71.0) and burner inserter at (16.5,72.0)
- Solution:
  - Verify entity existence before attempting operations
  - Handle cases where expected entities might be missing/destroyed

### Invalid Inventory Operations
- Attempted to place fast inserter without having any in inventory
- Solution:
  - Check inventory before placement attempts
  - Implement proper inventory management system

### Path Connection Errors
- Failed to connect transport belts between same entity (17.5,73.5)
- Solution:
  - Validate connection endpoints are different entities
  - Ensure proper path calculation between source and destination

### Movement Command Errors
- Invalid move_to() command with string indices
- Solution:
  - Validate position parameters before movement
  - Ensure proper coordinate handling in movement functions

### Power Connection Issues
- Electric mining drill at (17.5,73.5) not receiving
